body: Ok so I do like this and was able to jerk to it, but now that I'm done finishing my business...know how to stop this shit from happening? As soon as one of you gets molested, you grab that fuckers hand, and shout "molester" or something and make a fuss about it. This guy is now caught. Oh, you don't know if he's one of the "numbers" or a normal molester? who the fuck cares. keep making a fuss about every single molester you catch and you'll either A) take down several/all the "numbers" by chance or B) just fucking scare them off and they stop doing this shit. Either way, problem is solved because your trains are safe.
This has potential. I expect it to get a hentai adaptation at some point.
